name: How Much?
description: This project helps the user keep track of the expenses. The user can add a category and then add a payments inside that category

name: Zeta Store
description: A project built for being a full functionall market page. Where the user cand trade (sell or buy) his favourite csgo's skins.

name: Vacay Inn
description: Room reservation web, allows users to sign up and log in to see detailed data about rooms and create reservations. Counts with a back-end server built with Ruby on Rails. Frontend uses React/Redux.

name: Bloggerly
description: Bloggerly Is a classic example of a blog website. This websilte will show the list of posts and will allow users to interact with them by adding comments and liking posts, as any other social website.

name: Recipe App
description: Recipe App is a Ruby on Rails application that allows a user to login to a food recipe page where the user can perform actions based on authorization like, add foods and recipes, generate a shopping list, etc.
